EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to Join Collaborate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
You have been invited by a Navigator with the STADD Program (Services to Adults with Developmental Disabilities) to become a user of our online planning and information sharing tool known as Collaborate. Collaborate allows members of a youthâ€™s support team to share information and create a transition plan in one online space.
Click this link to Register for Collaborate: http://developmental-disability-support.gov.bc.ca
Note: You must have either a government IDIR or a valid BCeID to register for Collaborate. If you need a BCeID, click the "Register for BCeID" link in the upper right-hand corner of the webpage and register for a Basic BCeID.
If you have questions or require assistance, please contact our STADD Administrator.
Phone: 1-855-356-5609
Email: Stadd_Support@gov.bc.ca
